mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, passwd, name, email, tel, addr) VALUES( #{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{addr})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE id = #{id} AND passwd = #{passwd} AND del_yn='N'
SELECT id, name, email, tel, addr FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name=#{name}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, addr=#{addr}, regdate=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND passwd=#{passwd}
